channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT

item.title: Report X-2023051414
item.description:
Report X-2023051414

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-12
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WEIGHT WAS INCORRECT SHIPPED AS 25 POUNDS BUT THE ACTUAL WEIGHT OF THE PACKAGE WAS 70 LBS. DURING THE PROCESS OF WEIGHING THE PACKAGE IT BROKE OPEN DISCOVERING APPROXIMATELY 139 LITHIUM ION BATTERIES FOR TWO-WAY RADIOS. SOME OF THE BATTERIES HAVE CLIPS ON THEM. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THERE IS A CONTENT DESCRIPTION HANDWRITTEN STATING 184 BATTERIES. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM BILLINGS, MONTANA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 2281FA, UNITED RENTALS-D40, 5710 E 56TH AVE UNIT C, COMMERCE CITY CO 80022.
